CustomField.formula: cve__MailingStreet__c + BR() + cve__MailingCity__c + IF(AND(NOT(ISBLANK(cve__MailingCity__c)), OR(NOT(ISBLANK(cve__MailingState__c)), NOT(ISBLANK(cve__MailingPostalCode__c)), NOT(ISBLANK(cve__MailingCountry__c)))), BR(), '') + cve__MailingState__c + IF(AND(NOT(ISBLANK(cve__MailingState__c)), NOT(ISBLANK(cve__MailingPostalCode__c))), ', ', '') + cve__MailingPostalCode__c + IF(AND(OR(NOT(ISBLANK(cve__MailingState__c)), NOT(ISBLANK(cve__MailingPostalCode__c))), NOT(ISBLANK(cve__MailingCountry__c))), BR(), '') + cve__MailingCountry__c
CustomField.label: Mailing Address
